title: Chapter 1: The Awakening
credits: Director/script writer/story artist/layout/design/animation assistant/sound design: Crystal Galloway Lead animator/editor/compilation/sound editor: Brittney Galloway Music Lead: Mariah Clark Battle Music: Tritus - Fight loop
description: Chaos and despair fill the Magnolia Castle as Queen Felicity realizes her daughter is missing. Meanwhile, a traveling fay stumbles into a plot far bigger than himself.

title: Chapter 2: The Arrangement
credits: Director/script writer/story artist/layout/design/animation assistant/sound design: Crystal Galloway Lead animator/editor/compilation/sound editor: Brittney Galloway Music Lead: Mariah Clark Layout Artist/map designer: Kyle Prusa
description: Who's the dark skinned beauty Harmony found? Who is Damhan and why is she talking with Nirvana, the queen's hand?

title: Chapter 3: The Crime
credits: Director/script writer/story artist/layout/design/animation assistant/sound design: Crystal Galloway Lead animator/editor/compilation/sound editor: Brittney Galloway Music Lead: Mariah Clark Layout Artist/map designer: Kyle Prusa
description: Harmony, Love, and Tranquility have been separated on the kingdom's outskirts. While trying to find each other, they fight off beasts and evade the royal knights as best they can.

title: Chapter 4: The Search
credits: Director/script writer/story artist/layout/design/animation assistant/sound design: Crystal Galloway Lead animator/editor/compilation/sound editor: Brittney Galloway Music Lead: Mariah Clark Layout Artist/map designer: Kyle Prusa
description: The royal knights bring Princess Joy, Harmony, and Tranquility to the castle to see the queen. Elated to have her daughter home again, Harmony and Tranquility are allowed to leave, but they still haven't found Love. Where could Love have gone?

title: Extras- History 1
description: Find out more about the Magnolia Kingdom's complicated history.

title: Extras- History 2
description: Find out more about the outskirts of the  Magnolia Kingdom, the Topag.

title: Extras- Flower Tale - The Knight Serenity
description: Find out more about Harmony's background.

title: Extras- Flower Tale - The Child of Love
